id.graduacao: Postgraduate in Software Engineering - PUC Minas
id.tags: Dev | React | JavaScript | TypeScript | HTML | CSS | Node.js | Web System

sobre.quemEuSou: I'm Monique Duarte, 30 years old, postgraduate student in Software Engineering at PUC Minas, Zootechnician and Master of Science at USP. I'm seeking an opportunity as a developer, passionate about technology, focused on development, automation, AI, and innovation.
sobre.atualmente: Currently, I am a front-end intern, collaborating with support and engineering teams on project analysis and quality. My focus is on automated solutions, learning React, and testing that optimize processes and improve efficiency for myself and my colleagues.
sobre.objetivos: I am always seeking new challenges and opportunities to apply and expand my knowledge. My current goal is to gain experience and grow professionally in programming, improving my skills and consolidating my career in technology.
